channel.title: Help me what is DAT file
channel.description:
what is a DAT FILE....becuase on my sever..i cant update ne of the characters...its in a folder called {savedgames} and on all the other ones i have there just called char and tehre text documents..... on the savedgames there DAT file..i tryed opening it with notepad...wordpad... i dont know how to change it to a text document or nething else so somone please help me.....
If you know how to turn my "savegames" into just a folder i can have named characters and make them just text documents.....i tryed to just copy a character file from anouther sever but when i loged a new char in on the file with the "savegames" and the DAT files.....it never saved in the "characters"
please help
btw here are some pics. [img]http://i99.photobucket.com/albums/l295/leaky33/DATfile.jpg[/img]

open with wordpad or notepad

what is a DAT FILE…becuase on my sever…i cant update ne of the characters…its in a folder called {savedgames} and on all the other ones i have there just called char and tehre text documents… on the savedgames there DAT file…i tryed opening it with notepad…wordpad… i dont know how to change it to a text document or nething else so somone please help me…
